content.title: Powerful Features...
content.text: Built for demanding workflows, InDesign integrates smoothly with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Acrobat, InCopy, and Dreamweaver software.   InDesign offers powerful features for creating richer, more complex documents and reliably outputs pages to multiple media.

content.title: Why attend one of our Adobe InDesign courses?
content.text: Attending our InDesign courses allows participants to explore more creative possibilities and experience new levels of productivity using Adobe InDesign page layout software. Our course attendees learn how - with its sophisticated design features and enhanced productivity tools for streamlining repetitive task - InDesign lets you work faster and better than ever.
